$interpreted: Angelia: ......
Naya: ...Angelia.
Angelia: ...I'm sorry, Naya. I got a little carried away again.
Naya: It's okay. We're just sneaking out of the palace for some fresh air. It's nothing we haven't done before.
Naya: ...But why the Slums, of all places?
Angelia: ...Perhaps... it's because this is where I started from.
Angelia: Back then was the first time I ever saw the darkness that threatened to enshroud our kingdom.
Angelia: Ever since, I've opposed my uncle with all my strength, so that light may return to my people...
Naya: As have I.
Angelia: ...But what if I'm mistaken, and can't see the truth clearly?
Angelia: What if all this darkness isn't Uncle's doing at all—What if it's swallowing him up instead?
Naya: Huh...
Angelia: ...Just like... it's swallowing me...
Naya: Angelia... You're being too hard on yourself. You've done so much already.
Naya: The Royal household can't tame the Twelve Noble Houses without help.
Angelia: ...I know...
Angelia: After the House of Vincent was eliminated, they all began to gather private armies.
Angelia: They always steered clear of Uncle Theodore's conflicts before. It was always the Royal forces that had to bear the brunt of things...
Naya: True... All we can do is hold on for now, Angelia. We'll defeat Theodore, and one day we'll topple them, too...
Angelia: One day...
Angelia: Was that... a woman's scream I just heard? Did you hear it, Naya?
Naya: Yeah! It sounded like it came from over there!
Karen: Just give up. A precious princess like you doesn't stand a chance of getting out of here in one piece.
Karen: Go back with me now, for the sake of your father's honor, and I won't pursue this matter any further.
???: ...How unfortunate... A princess like me shouldn't have to beg for mercy, either.
Angelia: Isn't that girl... Miss Adelaide, of the House of Serafin?
Naya: And that woman with her... seems familiar somehow, too...
Karen: You asked for it.
Angelia: Oh no! Quick, Naya, do something!
Karen: Stay out of this...
Karen: (Wait, that red cloak... Where've I seen it before... and her face...)
Karen: The Queen?!
Adelaide: ...It's Her Highness, Queen Angelia! What are you...
Angelia: ...It's been a long time, Miss Adelaide. I still remember the teas and social dances we used to see each other at, when we were both young.
Angelia: And as for you... I believe we've met before...
Angelia: If I'm not mistaken, you would be... President Karen of the Desert Kingdom Board of Commerce?
Karen: ......
Karen: ...I guess there's no going back now.
Naya: You're not hitting her?
Karen: She's the princess of the House of Serafin. I could never hit her. I was going to take her back with me before she could see Her Highness.
Angelia: Before she could see me?
Karen: But it looks like that doesn't matter anymore.
Karen: ...I bring my master's best regards. My master is looking forward... to the day you'll meet again.
Naya: What's up with her, huh? What a weirdo.
Angelia: We can worry about that later. Right now we have to get Miss Adelaide some medical attention...
Adelaide: ...I'm okay, Your Highness. Thank you.
Adelaide: ...Adelaide Serafin, at your service. Please forgive me for not recognizing you earlier, your dress today is...
Adelaide: ...very original.
Angelia: You must mean my cloak... I didn't want to be spotted out here in the Slums...
Adelaide: Yes, I'd heard that you often visit here. So, the rumors were true...
Adelaide: ......
Angelia: Uh... Did you have something to tell me, Adelaide?
Adelaide: ......
Adelaide: ...No, Your Highness. If the Queen is putting on disguises and visiting the Slums, that is her business.
Angelia: (...What an attitude she has. Cut from the same cloth as the rest of the Serafins...)
Angelia: President Karen said you wanted to see me? What is it?
Adelaide: ......
Angelia: Miss Adelaide?
Adelaide: I know it's beyond all etiquette to request an audience with the Queen at such short notice...
Adelaide: —I've come to lodge an accusation against my father.
Angelia: Your father, the Head of House Serafin?
Adelaide: My father is conspiring with the rest of the Twelve Noble Houses—
Adelaide: To restore the traitor and former Regent Theodore Carlos to the throne.

Adelaide: With my father leading them, the Twelve Nobles have long been dissatisfied with Your Highness's... feebleness. Especially with this latest dispute with Atlas over the extradition of those fugitives...
Angelia: ...This is a grave accusation, Miss Adelaide.
Adelaide: I know. I'm a Serafin myself, Your Highness.
Angelia: ...Please continue.
Adelaide: I happened to see a letter between my father and the other heads of the Houses...
Naya: How dare they! Are they all in on this together?! They were never to be trusted!
Adelaide: I... I've thought it over carefully. I feel you should know, Your Highness.
Adelaide: But in my carelessness I was discovered by one of Theodore's acolytes. She wanted to take me back with her, but I managed to escape and fled here...
Naya: So even the President of the Board of Commerce is working for Theodore, too...!
Angelia: ......
Angelia: ...Adelaide, before I make up my mind as to whether to believe you or not, can you explain to me your reasons for betraying your father?
Naya: Angelia...!
Adelaide: It's okay. I expected you would ask me this question, Your Highness.
Adelaide: —I believe in fate, Your Highness.
Angelia: Fate?
Adelaide: The clearest reflection of our fate is our lineage. None can choose nor change the place they are born into.
Adelaide: That's why you, of the most honorable blood in all the Kingdom of the Sun, sit upon the throne, is it not?
Angelia: ...Well...
Adelaide: I'm no different. Born into one of the Twelve Noble Houses, it is my duty to support my Queen.
Adelaide: Where lineage is concerned, you are the true, legitimate Queen. And the former Regent... is just that. A Regent, no more.
Angelia: ...And you are in disagreement with your father, the Head of House Seraphin, on this point?
Adelaide: No. We both know this to be so. He has simply succumbed to his own selfish desires. But I wish to remain true to my fate.
Adelaide: There is only one glorious sun that reigns over our lands. There can be only one Queen—My Queen.
Angelia: ......

Model.Text: ...Angelia.
...I'm sorry, Naya. I got a little carried away again.
It's okay. We're just sneaking out of the palace for some fresh air. It's nothing we haven't done before.
...But why the Slums, of all places?
...Perhaps... it's because this is where I started from.
Back then was the first time I ever saw the darkness that threatened to enshroud our kingdom.
Ever since, I've opposed my uncle with all my strength, so that light may return to my people...
As have I.
...But what if I'm mistaken, and can't see the truth clearly?
What if all this darkness isn't Uncle's doing at all—What if it's swallowing him up instead?
Huh...
...Just like... it's swallowing me...
Angelia... You're being too hard on yourself. You've done so much already.
The Royal household can't tame the Twelve Noble Houses without help.
...I know...
After the House of Vincent was eliminated, they all began to gather private armies.
They always steered clear of Uncle Theodore's conflicts before. It was always the Royal forces that had to bear the brunt of things...
True... All we can do is hold on for now, Angelia. We'll defeat Theodore, and one day we'll topple them, too...
One day...
...Gwaagh!!!!
Was that... a woman's scream I just heard? Did you hear it, Naya?
Yeah! It sounded like it came from over there!
Just give up. A precious princess like you doesn't stand a chance of getting out of here in one piece.
Go back with me now, for the sake of your father's honor, and I won't pursue this matter any further.
...How unfortunate... A princess like me shouldn't have to beg for mercy, either.
Isn't that girl... Miss Adelaide, of the House of Serafin?
And that woman with her... seems familiar somehow, too...
You asked for it.
Oh no! Quick, Naya, do something!
Stay out of this...
(Wait, that red cloak... Where've I seen it before... and her face...)
The Queen?!
Huh?!
...It's Her Highness, Queen Angelia! What are you...
...It's been a long time, Miss Adelaide. I still remember the teas and social dances we used to see each other at, when we were both young.
And as for you... I believe we've met before...
If I'm not mistaken, you would be... President Karen of the Desert Kingdom Board of Commerce?
...I guess there's no going back now.
You're not hitting her?
She's the princess of the House of Serafin. I could never hit her. I was going to take her back with me before she could see Her Highness.
Before she could see me?
But it looks like that doesn't matter anymore.
...I bring my master's best regards. My master is looking forward... to the day you'll meet again.
What's up with her, huh? What a weirdo.
We can worry about that later. Right now we have to get Miss Adelaide some medical attention...
...I'm okay, Your Highness. Thank you.
...Adelaide Serafin, at your service. Please forgive me for not recognizing you earlier, your dress today is...
...very original.
You must mean my cloak... I didn't want to be spotted out here in the Slums...
Yes, I'd heard that you often visit here. So, the rumors were true...
Uh... Did you have something to tell me, Adelaide?
...No, Your Highness. If the Queen is putting on disguises and visiting the Slums, that is her business.
(...What an attitude she has. Cut from the same cloth as the rest of the Serafins...)
President Karen said you wanted to see me? What is it?
Miss Adelaide?
I know it's beyond all etiquette to request an audience with the Queen at such short notice...
—I've come to lodge an accusation against my father.
Your father, the Head of House Serafin?
My father is conspiring with the rest of the Twelve Noble Houses—
To restore the traitor and former Regent Theodore Carlos to the throne.

With my father leading them, the Twelve Nobles have long been dissatisfied with Your Highness's... feebleness. Especially with this latest dispute with Atlas over the extradition of those fugitives...
...This is a grave accusation, Miss Adelaide.
I know. I'm a Serafin myself, Your Highness.
...Please continue.
I happened to see a letter between my father and the other heads of the Houses...
How dare they! Are they all in on this together?! They were never to be trusted!
I... I've thought it over carefully. I feel you should know, Your Highness.
But in my carelessness I was discovered by one of Theodore's acolytes. She wanted to take me back with her, but I managed to escape and fled here...
So even the President of the Board of Commerce is working for Theodore, too...!
...Adelaide, before I make up my mind as to whether to believe you or not, can you explain to me your reasons for betraying your father?
Angelia...!
It's okay. I expected you would ask me this question, Your Highness.
—I believe in fate, Your Highness.
Fate?
The clearest reflection of our fate is our lineage. None can choose nor change the place they are born into.
That's why you, of the most honorable blood in all the Kingdom of the Sun, sit upon the throne, is it not?
...Well...
I'm no different. Born into one of the Twelve Noble Houses, it is my duty to support my Queen.
Where lineage is concerned, you are the true, legitimate Queen. And the former Regent... is just that. A Regent, no more.
...And you are in disagreement with your father, the Head of House Seraphin, on this point?
No. We both know this to be so. He has simply succumbed to his own selfish desires. But I wish to remain true to my fate.
There is only one glorious sun that reigns over our lands. There can be only one Queen—My Queen.

Did you have something to tell me, Adelaide?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...No, Your Highness. If the Queen is putting on disguises and visiting the Slums, that is her business.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(...What an attitude she has. Cut from the same cloth as the rest of the Serafins...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_29_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"President Karen said you wanted to see me? What is it?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Miss Adelaide?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I know it's beyond all etiquette to request an audience with the Queen at such short notice...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2014I've come to lodge an accusation against my father.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Your father, the Head of House Serafin?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"My father is conspiring with the rest of the Twelve Noble Houses\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_33_002","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"To restore the traitor and former Regent Theodore Carlos to the throne.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"With my father leading them, the Twelve Nobles have long been dissatisfied with Your Highness's... feebleness. Especially with this latest dispute with Atlas over the extradition of those fugitives...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...This is a grave accusation, Miss Adelaide.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_34_002","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I know. I'm a Serafin myself, Your Highness.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_34_003","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Please continue.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_34_004","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I happened to see a letter between my father and the other heads of the Houses...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How dare they! Are they all in on this together?! They were never to be trusted!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_35_001","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I... I've thought it over carefully. I feel you should know, Your Highness.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_35_002","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But in my carelessness I was discovered by one of Theodore's acolytes. She wanted to take me back with her, but I managed to escape and fled here...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_35_003","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So even the President of the Board of Commerce is working for Theodore, too...!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_35_004","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Adelaide, before I make up my mind as to whether to believe you or not, can you explain to me your reasons for betraying your father?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_36_001","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Angelia...!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_36_002","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's okay. I expected you would ask me this question, Your Highness.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2014I believe in fate, Your Highness.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_37_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Fate?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_37_002","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The clearest reflection of our fate is our lineage. None can choose nor change the place they are born into.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_37_003","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That's why you, of the most honorable blood in all the Kingdom of the Sun, sit upon the throne, is it not?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_37_004","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Well...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_37_005","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm no different. Born into one of the Twelve Noble Houses, it is my duty to support my Queen.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_37_006","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Where lineage is concerned, you are the true, legitimate Queen. And the former Regent... is just that. A Regent, no more.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_37_007","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...And you are in disagreement with your father, the Head of House Seraphin, on this point?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_37_008","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No. We both know this to be so. He has simply succumbed to his own selfish desires. But I wish to remain true to my fate.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Adelaide","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0237","IconName":"h0237s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"There is only one glorious sun that reigns over our lands. There can be only one Queen\u2014My Queen.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_001_dialog_english##_38_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
